name: Pokemon: Dawn of Darkness
summary: Pokémon: Dawn of Darkness is a fan made Pokémon MMORPG which is currently in it's Alpha Testing stage. The game has been being worked on for just over a year and has shown great progress. It's fairly safe to say that we currently host the most stable and secure Game Server, compared to any similar kinds of games. Our Client and Server use encrypted data to communicate, to make reading your private data much more of a task as well as keeping away hackers and cheaters!
